merchandise
Jonsbo VR3 Mini-ITX Case - Black
fields.description:
- Dual chamber design with separate heat chambers

- Generous air intakes and fireplace effect for high airflow

- Space for a 280 radiator

- A total of up to two 140mm fans possible

- Accommodates up to two 2.5" drives and two 3.5" drives

- For graphics cards up to 325 mm in length


The noble Mini-ITX case comes with a clever dual-chamber design and therefore offers plenty of space for powerful gaming systems. The VR3 from Jonsbo proves that powerful hardware and a compact housing format do not have to be mutually exclusive. The noble manufacturer even packs this in a chic design made of black steel. Front and side panels are completely crisscrossed with air holes to ensure optimal airflow for your components.

Externally, Jonsbo's VR3 impresses with its elegant brushed steel design and flawless workmanship. The simple design is only interrupted by a power button, a USB 3.0 type A port and a USB type C port in the front.
fields.highlights:
Plenty of space for drives in a compact enclosure.

With its compact dimensions, the VR3 from Jonsbo looks small, but inside you can accommodate full-blown gaming hardware. Due to the space-saving and clever two-chamber design, the case can accommodate a Mini-ITX motherboard as well as a graphics card with a length of up to 325 mm. The graphics card is mounted vertically on the back of the motherboard tray, visually impressive. For this purpose, a suitable riser cable (PCIe 4.0) is included in the scope of delivery. Up to two 2.5- and 3.5-inch drives can also be accommodated in the VR3. If you install two 3.5-inch drives, the graphics card may be up to 185 mm long.

In addition to saving space, the concept of two separate chambers also brings advantages in cooling the components. In total, up to two 120mm fans or two 140mm fans can be installed in the case. In combination with the generous air passages that extend over the entire housing wall, excellent airflow is thus ensured. Alternatively, a 280mm radiator for water cooling can be installed on the front.

The Jonsbo VR3 is flexible when it comes to power supply. For particularly power-hungry gaming systems, a full blown ATX power supply can be installed here. If you prefer a smaller standard, you can alternatively mount an SFX power supply.
fields.technical_details:
Specifications:

- Dimensions: 204 x 382 x 255 mm (W x H x D)

- Materials: Steel

- Weight: 5.28kg

- Color: Black

- Form factor: Mini ITX

Total fans possible:

- 2 x 120 / 140mm (front)

- Of which pre-installed: none

Radiator mounts:

- 1 x 240mm (front)

- Dust filter: Mesh (side, front, removable)

Drive bays:

- 2 x 2.5 inches

- 2 x 3.5 inches

- Power supply: SFX, SFX-L, ATX (up to 150mm, optional)

- Expansion slots: 2 (dual slot, vertical)

I/O panel:

- 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1, Type A

- 1 x USB 3.2 Gen 1, Type-C

- 1 x 3.5 mm jack (audio in/out)

- 1 x power button

- Maximum CPU cooler height: 70mm

- Maximum graphics card length: 330 mm

- Maximum graphics card height: 60 mm

Scope of delivery:

-Jonsbo VR3 Mini-ITX housing

- riser cable, PCIe 4.0

fields.name: Lian Li DK-05F Height Adjustable Desktop Case - Black
fields.description:
The Lian-Li housing made of aluminum and steel offers not only an elegant look with great hardware compatibility, but also plenty of space for dual systems and powerful custom water cooling as well as many well-thought-out functions. The highlight of the DK-05F is the unique table top made of tempered glass. This changes between a transparent and opaque state at the push of a button. The perfect balance between innovation, elegance and endless possibilities.

The features of the Lian Li DK-05F table case at a glance:

- Elegant and height-adjustable table case made of steel and aluminum

- For dual systems and two motherboards up to E-ATX form factor

- Switchable table top made of tempered glass (transparent / opaque)

- Integrated RGB and fan controller

- Four pre-installed RGB strips with 66 RGB LEDs

- Control panel with RGB, fan, height and glass panel control

- Space for two 360, one 240 and two 480/420 mm radiators

- Up to eight 2.5 and 3.5 inch disks

- Main front I / O with 1 x USB 3.1 Type C and 4 x USB 3.0 Type A

- Noble table case with a unique look

The elegant design made of aluminum and tempered glass uses a robust and durable steel construction. Despite the stable construction, the DK-05F retains an elegant look, the highlight of which is the unique table top made of 8mm thick tempered glass.

This switches between two states at the push of a button: an opaque satin effect and complete transparency. The opaque condition with satin effect is perfect for situations where full concentration is required and distraction is undesirable. In the transparent state, the pane allows a view of the built-in hardware and complex custom water cooling.

With the chic glass plate and the four already installed RGB LED strips with a total of 66 RGB LEDs, your own hardware can be staged particularly well. The integrated RGB controller is controlled via an RGB button in the control panel of the housing and enables easy switching between seven lighting modes. With the push of a button, you can switch between colours, synchronize with the motherboard or switch off the lighting completely.
fields.highlights:
Enough space for two high-end gaming systems

The DK-05F is intended for dual systems and offers two removable motherboard trays. Motherboards in the E-ATX, ATX, Micro-ATX or Mini-ITX form factor can be placed on it. The two up to 230 mm long ATX power supplies are placed next to the boards. Graphics cards with a length of up to 400 mm can be installed in a total of 16 PCI panels.

Up to 185 mm of space is available for large CPU coolers under the glass lid. A total of eight 2.5 and 3.5 inch data carriers can be mounted in HDD cages. The four cages each offer space for up to two 3.5-inch or 2.5-inch data carriers.

Designed for custom water cooling

In total, the table case has space for eighteen 120 mm or ten 140 mm fans. The DK-05F is already equipped with twelve 120 mm fans at the factory - which can be operated in five different modes thanks to the built-in fan controller and the buttons on the control panel. Four modes call up preset speed levels between 100 percent power and silent operation. The fifth mode allows the fans to be controlled via the PWM signal of the motherboard.

The housing has been specially designed for custom water cooling - and you can see that: in the front of the DK-05F, two removable radiator brackets each hold a 480 or 420 mm radiator. There is space for two 360 mm radiators in the bottom of the housing, also on removable brackets. Finally, an additional 240 radiator can be installed in the rear wall.

Well thought-out table case with many features

In addition to extensive hardware and water cooling compatibility, the Lian Li DK-05F offers many other useful features. Thanks to the built-in electric motor, the height of the table housing can be easily adjusted. Using the height control on the control panel, the table can be brought into any desired position between 689 mm and 1175 mm. Up to four height positions can be saved and can be called up using dedicated buttons on the control panel.

The I / O panel in the front has one USB 3.1 Type-C and four USB 3.0 Type-A ports as well as two audio connections. The I / O panel for the second system offers a power button, two USB 3.0 ports and two audio sockets. For a clean cable management, the edges of the table top are provided with a screen, under which cables can be hidden.
fields.technical_details:
Technical details:

- Table dimensions: 1400 x 689 - 1175 x 780 mm (W x H x D)

- Table top dimensions: 1400 x 8 x 780 mm (W x H x D)

- Material: Tempered glass (table top), aluminum (housing outside), steel (housing inside, legs)

- Color: Black

- Form factor: 2 x E-ATX, ATX, Micro-ATX, Mini-ITX (two motherboard trays, removable)

- Fan (overall possible):

- 6 x 140 mm / 8 x 120 mm (front)

- 6 x 120 mm (middle)

- 1 x 140/120 mm (rear left)

- 2 x 140/120 mm (rear center)

- 1 x 140/120 mm (rear right)

- Fan (pre-installed):

- 8 x 120 mm (front)

- 1 x 120 mm (rear left)

- 2 x 120 mm (rear center)

- 1 x 120 mm (rear right)

- Radiator mountings:

- 2 x 360 mm (center, removable)

- 1 x 240 mm (rear center)

- 2 x 480/420 mm (front, removable)

- Drive bays: 4 x HDD cage (removable)

- 8 x 2.5- / 3.5-inch (internal)

- Illumination: 4 x LED strips (pre-installed, 66 LEDs)

- Power supply: 2 x standard ATX (optional)

- Expansion slots: 2 x 8

- Main system I / O panel:

- 1 x RGB controller

- 1 x fan controller

- 1 x controls height adjustment

- 1 x power button / controls tabletop

- 4 x USB 3.0 (internal connection

- 1 x USB 3.1 Type C

- 1 x per audio in / out

- Second system I / O panel:

- 1 x power button

- 4 x USB 3.0 (internal connection

- 1 x per audio in / out

- Maximum graphics card length: 400 mm (without any waiver)

- Maximum power supply length: 230 mm

- Maximum CPU cooler height: 185 mm

fields.name: Lian Li 011 Dynamic EVO - Grey
fields.description:
﻿The Lian Li O11 Dynamic EVO - The evolution continues.

Developed in cooperation with Roman "der8auer" Hartung, Lian Li O11 Dynamic EVO is the successor of the popular O11 Dynamic. The case not only has a refreshed design with recognition value, but also offers amazing versatility. Besides the option to install the graphics card vertically, the whole case can be turned upside down. This way, you can always present the best side of your case.
fields.highlights:
Features:
- Very versatile design case with 2-chamber system
- Space for E-ATX, ATX, Micro-ATX, or Mini-ITX motherboards
- Front and side panel made of tinted tempered glass
- High quality processed lightweight steel construction
- Brushed aluminium ornamental strip
- Modular I/O panel with one USB-C and two USB 3.0 ports
- Graphics cards up to 422 mm length
- Up to ten 120 mm fans possible
- Suitable for powerful ATX power supplies

Various options for fans and radiators
The Lian Li O11 Dynamic EVO offers mounting options for 360 mm radiators on the top as well as the side and bottom. Therefore, this midi tower is optimally prepared for efficient water cooling. It should be noted that the radiators on the lid and on the side together with the fans may not exceed 83 mm in width.
In total, up to ten 120-mm-fans fit inside the case, providing enough air movement to cool even the most powerful components:
- Three 120-mm-fans on the lid,
- three 120-mm-fans on the side,
- another three 120-mm-fans at the bottom
- as well as a 120 mm fan at the back.
To keep your case clean, a handy dust filter is integrated in the bottom. A 60-mm-fan can be installed on the HDD cage to provide better cooling for your hard drives. They tend to get warmer during intensive continuous load, for example stream recording for several hours.
There are practically no limits when it comes to choosing a high-performance CPU cooler. This case allows you to comfortably install coolers with up to 167 mm height.

The (r)evolutionary reverse mode
A special feature of the Lian Li O11 Dynamic EVO is the reverse mode. Every PC enthusiast is well aware of the issue: your computer would just fit much better on the other side of the desk, but then you can't see the chocolate side of your build.
Lian Li enables you with the O11 Dynamic EVO to easily swap the top and bottom of your case and turn the computer around. So you always have the best view of your PC.
fields.technical_details:

Weight: 12.7 kg

Colour: Grey

Cable management tray: 2 x 2.5"

fields.name: Streacom BC1 Mini V2 Benchtable - Black
fields.description:
- Completely removable like a camping table at a height of only 8 mm
- No length restrictions for GPU(s), power supply or CPU cooler
- 2x 2.5" drives and 2x radiators up to 240 mm
- Tool-free assembly thanks to knurled screws
- Open concept for creative extensions and add-ons


Streacom is a master of precision-crafted PC cases made of high-quality, solid aluminum and is also famous for its benchtables. With Hwbot and OverClocking TV, Streacom has succeeded in bringing together well-known figures of the international overclocking community behind it and has created cleverly designed, transportable and open benchmark tables as part of the "Open Benchtable Project", such as the BC1. With the BC1 Mini V2 gives the smaller output, which was created especially for Mini-ITX motherboards.
fields.highlights:
The word 'open' applies here in two respects, because the Streacom BC1 Mini V2 not only lets the hardware work in the fresh air, but also allows third-party providers and 3D printing hobbyists to develop and sell official accessories and extensions for the benchtable . The highlight of the BC1 Mini V2: The bench table can be dismantled at any time like a camping table and thus put into a flat transport state. This makes it child's play to quickly and easily set up and dismantle a complete test platform - a dream for overclockers!

Compact dimensions and extremely low weight for maximum mobility
The BC1 Mini V2 also becomes the perfect accessory for overclockers, enthusiasts, cryptocoin miners and specialists who need a benchtable that is convenient to transport when traveling due to Streacom's typical choice of lightweight aluminum as the base plate material. The resulting weight of only 785 grams speaks for itself. The design for mobile applications is also made clear by the practical carrying handle, through which the bench table can be transported like a suitcase.

The manageable dimensions of 19 centimeters by 23 centimeters at a height of 8.1 centimeters in the assembled state and just 8 millimeters in the transport state do the rest. However, the lightweight is also relatively filigree and thus subject to various weight restrictions. Power supplies may weigh a maximum of 8 kilograms and radiators per bracket a maximum of 5 kilograms, while the permissible total weight of all installed components is 15 kilograms.

High versatility with versatile hardware support
A 140/120-millimeter fan can be attached to sliding brackets on the right and left sides, which can alternatively give way to radiators up to 240 millimeters. In addition to knurled screws, spacers and brackets, the stands, which are also stowed in the base plate, have large, rubberized feet, which thus ensure a secure hold on common surfaces. The power supply is simply placed under the bench table when assembled and can be attached to the base plate in the desired orientation. Two 2.5-inch hard drives or SSDs can be discreetly accommodated on the underside opposite the PSU.

Tool-free assembly for best comfort

Thanks to thumbscrews and push-pin spacers for the motherboard, all components can be easily mounted with bare hands without tools, so a screwdriver is not necessary. For optimum stability, all screws, spacers and brackets are made of sturdy steel. All protruding parts can be stowed within the aluminium plate for transport and thus the whole bench table can be moved to another location extremely easily.
fields.technical_details:
Specifications:
- Dimensions: 230 x 8 / 81 x 190 mm (W x H x D, height dismantled/mounted)
- Material: aluminum (base plate), steel (screws, spacers)
- Weight: approx. 785g
- Color: Silver
- Form factor: Mini ITX, Mini DTX
- Motherboard spacer height: 25 mm
- Fan (optional, corresponding radiators up to 240 mm possible):
- 1 x 240 to 80 mm (left side)
- 1 x 240 to 80 mm (right side)
Drive options:
- 2 x 2.5 inches
- Supported power supply formats: SFX/SFX-L
- Maximum power supply length: unlimited
- Maximum graphics card length: unlimited
- Maximum CPU cooler height: unlimited
- Maximum power supply weight: 8 kg
- Maximum radiator weight per bracket: 5 kg
- Permissible total weight of all components: 15 kg
- I/O panel: 2x 12mm recesses

fields.name: Thunder X3 ED3 Gaming Table
fields.description:
The gaming table in classic black comes with an ergonomically shaped table top in carbon look.

The stable board made of chipboard offers plenty of space for gaming hardware and peripherals and has a waterproof plastic coating. The integrated headset holder and the clever cable management complete the overall package.
fields.highlights:
The features of the ED3 Gaming Desk from Thunder X3 at a glance:
- Large 112 x 60 cm gaming table
- Table legs made of high-quality, powder-coated steel
- 18 mm thick table top with waterproof plastic coating in carbon look
- Loadable up to 50 kilograms
- Clever cable management and cable bushings
- With practical holder for headsets / headphones
- Robust material, easy and quick to set up


The 18 mm thick chipboard with a fine plastic surface in carbon look rests on a solid but stylish frame made of steel. The ergonomically shaped table top allows comfortable working and gaming.

Thanks to the length of 112 centimeters and width of 60 centimeters, there is still enough space for monitors on the ED3 gaming desk of Thunder X3 in addition to the mouse and keyboard. A total of two round recesses on the sides allow cables to be led from the top down to the computer. There is a practical holder for headsets on the right side.

The table legs are made of sturdy steel. The two legs are connected at the top with a strong frame on which the table tops are attached. Thanks to the high-quality materials, the table can withstand an enormous 50 kilograms.
fields.technical_details:
- Dimensions: 1,120 x 750 x 600 mm (W x H x D)

- Weight: 18kg

- Loadable upto 50kg

- Material: Steel (frame and legs), chipboard (tabletop), plastic (tabletop surface)

- Colour: Black

fields.name: EK-Quantum Kinetic FLT 120 D5/DDC Body D-RGB Plexi
fields.description:
EK-Quantum Kinetic FLT 120 D5/DDC Body D-RGB are pumpless stand-alone versions of the recently released Kinetic FLT combo units.

This means the customer can attach his already owned DDC or D5 pump allowing for a more affordable upgrade process. This stand-alone unit does not include a pump!

EK-Quantum Kinetic FLT 120 D5/DDC Body D-RGB features the new flat-shaped reservoir that revolutionizes the way you were thinking about combo units and loop building. Since 120mm fan mounting patterns are the most dominant mounting options inside PC cases these days, these new Kinetic FLT D5 combo units will allow greater flexibility for installation since they don't require drilling of new mounting holes on your case.
fields.highlights:
EK-Quantum Kinetic FLT 120 D5/DDC Body D-RGB features the new flat-shaped reservoir that revolutionizes the way you were thinking about combo units and loop building. Since 120mm fan mounting patterns are the most dominant mounting options inside PC cases these days, these new Kinetic FLT D5 combo units will allow greater flexibility for installation since they don't require drilling of new mounting holes on your case.

A total of 6 G1/4" ports allow plenty of tube routing options and extra ports for drain/fill valves if you wish to implement them. The reservoir is manufactured of premium quality acrylic, machined to perfection, while the sealing is performed by a quality EPDM o-ring. Alongside the reservoir is a black anodized aluminum cover under which the addressable D-RGB LED strip is placed. Proper LED implementation is one of the main focus points of EK so that there are as few visible LED hotspots as possible.

Compatible with popular D-RGB sync technologies from all major motherboard manufacturers. The arrow marking on the 3-pin LED connector is to be aligned with the +5V marking on the RGB header.
fields.technical_details:
Technical specifications:

- Size (H x W x T): 125 x 120 x 86 mm (with the D5 mounting system)
- Size (H x W x T): 125 x 120 x 58mm (with the DDC mounting system)
- Capacity: ~100ml 
- D-RGB connector 3-pin 5V digital LED header (Pinout: +5V, D, Blocked, Ground)

Enclosed:

- EK-Quantum Kinetic FLT 120 PWM D5/DDC Body D-RGB
- Mounting mechanism with all necessary screws for 120mm fan hole mounting
- 4 × G 1/4 Plugs 
- 1 × Allen key

fields.name: EK Quantum Reflection DK-05F Left D-RGB Plexi
fields.description: It was specifically engineered for the Lian Li DK-05F desk-case. It is mounted on the front left part of the case. This model has a mirrored counterpart that mounts on the right side of the same desk-case.
fields.highlights:
This water distribution plate comes without a pump, but can be expanded with the EK-Quantum EK-Quantum Reflection Uni 140 D5 PWM D-RGB. As it's a coolant routing solution, it has an abundance of ports, to be specific 26 G1/4" ports. Ports are made so that you can use straight tubing lines and as few bends as possible.

This distro plate is made for the Lian Li desk-case, specifically on the front left side of it, and to be mounted on the EK-CoolStream PE480 radiator. A second radiator that connects to this waterway has to be EK-CoolStream XE360 or any smaller EK-CoolStream radiator.

These distro plates will make sure that the tube routing within this attractive case is even easier with added aesthetical benefits. 26 ports make sure that you can really pick the ones that fit your build and route to it easily.

The addressable D-RGB LED strip runs down the entire length of the unit while a black anodized aluminum cover hides the unwanted LED hotspots. The built in addressable LED strip contains 35 digital LED's and connects to the motherboards 5V header. It is also compatible with MSI Mystic Light Sync, AS-Rock Polychrome Sync, ASUS Aura Sync, and Gigabyte RGB Fusion 2 software for a coordinated lighting effect.
fields.technical_details:
Reservoir:
– Dimensions (W x D x H): 575 x 80 x 30mm
– Reservoir volume: ~198ml
– D-RGB LED count: 35
– D-RGB cable length: 800mm
– D-RGB connector standard 3-pin (+5V, Data, Blocked, Ground)

Enclosed:

- EK-Quantum Reflection DK-05F Left D-RGB
- 18x Nickel-plated Brass plugs
- 1x Allen key 2.5mm
- All necessary screws and mounting brackets

fields.name: EK Quantum Reflection DK-05F Right D-RGB Plexi
fields.description: It was specifically engineered for the Lian Li DK-05F desk-case, but it can also be mounted in the DK-04F. It is mounted on the right part of the desk-case. This model has a mirrored counterpart that mounts of the left side of the same desk-case.
fields.highlights:
This water distribution plate comes without a pump, but can be expanded with the EK-Quantum EK-Quantum Reflection Uni 140 D5 PWM D-RGB. As it's a coolant routing solution, it has an abundance of ports, to be specific 26 G1/4" ports. Ports are made so that you can use straight tubing lines and as few bends as possible.

This distro plate is made for the Lian Li desk-case, specifically on the right side of it, and to be mounted on the EK-CoolStream PE480 radiator. A second radiator that connects to this waterway has to be EK-CoolStream XE360 or any smaller EK-CoolStream radiator.

– D-RGB cable length: 800mm
– D-RGB connector standard 3-pin (+5V, Data, Blocked, Ground)

Enclosed:

- EK-Quantum Reflection DK-05F Right D-RGB
- 18x Nickel-plated Brass plugs
- 1x Allen key 2.5mm
- All necessary screws and mounting brackets

fields.name: EK Quantum Volume FLT 360 D-RGB Plexi
fields.description:
All new Flat (FLT) series of EK-Quantum Volume FLT reservoir units! The new Volume reservoirs are part of the EK Quantum line of products and come with sophisticated addressable D-RGB lighting implementation.

Each reservoir is featuring standard 120mm fan mounting holes for maximum flexibility during the installation. The reservoir is equipped with a total of four G 1/4" ports so that users can choose the most optimal setup for their liquid cooled loops.
fields.highlights:
The new flat-shaped reservoirs are to revolutionize the way you were thinking about reservoirs and loop building. Since 120mm fan mounting patterns are the most dominant mounting options inside PC cases these days, these new EK-Quantum Volume FLT reservoirs will allow greater flexibility for installation since they don't require drilling of new mounting holes on your case.

The reservoir is equipped with a total of four industry-standard G1/4" ports, which can be, based on the orientation of the unit, used as inlet and outlet ports.

The reservoir is manufactured of premium quality acrylic material, machined to perfection, while the sealing is performed by a quality EPDM o-ring. Alongside the reservoir is a black anodized aluminium cover under which the addressable D-RGB LED strip is placed. Proper LED implementation is one of the main focus points of EK so that there are as few visible LED hotspots as possible.
fields.technical_details:
Technical specifications:

- Size (H x W x T): 360 x 120 x 53.5 mm (with mounting system)
- Capacity: ~350ml 
- D-RGB connector 3-pin 5V digital LED header (Pinout: +5V, D, Blocked, Ground)

Enclosed:

- EK-Quantum Volume FLT 360 D-RGB
- Mounting mechanism with all necessary screws for 120mm fan mounting
- Pair of EK reservoir holders with mounting screws
- 2 × G1/4 Plugs 
- 1 × Allen key for reservoir holders

fields.name: Cablemod Pro Bridged Cable Comb Kit - Transparent
fields.description:
The otherwise annoying standard cables can be highlighted with single-core sleeves and matching cable combs.

With this set of 12 transparent cable combs, Cablemod offers a simple and clean way to keep and place the cables perfectly in the housing. The results always look professional.

- 4 x 16 pin (8 + 8 compatible)

fields.name: EK Quantum Kinetic FLT 240 D5/DDC Body D-RGB Plexi
fields.description:
EK Quantum Kinetic FLT 240 D5/DDC Body D-RGB units are pumpless stand-alone versions of the recently released Kinetic FLT combo units.

This means the customer can attach his already owned DDC or D5 pump allowing for a more affordable upgrade process. This standalone unit does not include a pump.
fields.highlights:
EK-Quantum Kinetic FLT 240 D5/DDC Body D-RGB features the new flat-shaped reservoir that revolutionizes the way you were thinking about combo units and loop building. Since 120mm fan mounting patterns are the most dominant mounting options inside PC cases these days, these new Kinetic FLT D5 combo units will allow greater flexibility for installation since they don't require drilling of new mounting holes on your case.

A total of 6 G1/4" ports allow plenty of tube routing options and extra ports for drain/fill valves if you wish to implement them. The reservoir is manufactured of premium quality acrylic material, machined to perfection, while the sealing is performed by a quality EPDM o-ring. Alongside the reservoir is a black anodized aluminum cover under which the Addressable D-RGB LED strip is placed. Proper LED implementation is one of the main focus points of EK so that there are as few visible "LED hotspots" as possible.

Compatible with popular D-RGB sync technologies from all major motherboard manufacturers. The arrow marking on the 3-pin LED connector is to be aligned with the 5V marking on the RGB header.
fields.technical_details:
- Size (H x W x T): 245 x 120 x 86mm (with the D5 mounting system)

- Size (H x W x T): 245 x 120 x 58mm (with the DDC mounting system)

- Capacity: ~265ml 

- D-RGB connector 3-pin 5V digital LED header (Pinout: +5V, D, Blocked, Ground)

Enclosed:

- EK-Quantum Kinetic FLT 240 PWM D5/DDC Body D-RGB
- Mounting mechanism with all necessary screws for 120mm fan hole mounting
- 4 × G1/4 Plugs 
- 1 × Allen key

This means customers can attach their already owned DDC or D5 pump allowing for a more affordable upgrade process. This standalone unit does not include a pump.

Since 360mm fan mounting patterns are the most dominant mounting options inside PC cases these days, these new Kinetic FLT D5 combo units will allow greater flexibility for installation since they don't require drilling of new mounting holes on your case.

A total of 6 G1/4" ports allow plenty of tube routing options and extra ports for drain/fill valves if you wish to implement them. The reservoir is manufactured of premium quality acrylic material, machined to perfection, while the sealing is performed by a quality EPDM o-ring. Alongside the reservoir is a black anodized aluminium cover under which the addressable D-RGB LED strip is placed. Proper LED implementation is one of the main focus points of EK so that there are as few visible LED hotspots as possible.

fields.name: EK Quantum Volume FLT 240 D-RGB Plexi
fields.description: All new flat FLT series EK-Quantum Volume FLT reservoir units. The new Volume reservoirs are part of the EK Quantum line of products and come with sophisticated addressable D-RGB lighting implementation. Each reservoir is featuring standard 120mm fan mounting holes for maximum flexibility during the installation. The reservoir is equipped with a total of four G1/4" ports so that users can choose the most optimal setup for their liquid cooling loops.
fields.highlights:
The new flat-shaped reservoirs are to revolutionize the way you were thinking about reservoirs and loop building. Since 120mm fan mounting patterns are the most dominant mounting options inside PC cases these days, these new EK-Quantum Volume FLT reservoirs will allow greater flexibility for installation since they don't require drilling of new mounting holes on your case.

The reservoir is equipped with a total of four industry-standard G1/4" ports, which can be, based on the orientation of the unit, used as inlet and outlet ports.

The reservoir is manufactured of premium quality acrylic material, machined to perfection, while the sealing is performed by a quality EPDM o-ring. Alongside the reservoir is a black anodized aluminum cover under which the Addressable D-RGB LED strip is placed. Proper LED implementation is one of the main focus points of EK so that there are as few visible "LED hotspots" as possible.

fields.name: Jonsbo VR3 Mini-ITX Case - Black 2
Jonsbo VR3 Mini-ITX Case - Black 3

fields.review:
Its a big heavy desk - its very deep though which doesn't feel very comfortable.
I expected a little better for such an expensive desk - but it does everything you expect, there is room for two systems with space to spare and its well built.
Next time I think i'll just buy two cases and have a separate desk for them.
fields.title: Could be better
